content: Today’s my 1 year WFH anniversary, and the only thing that’s better now is my setup 😂

photo.alt: A white narrow desk with a 27” iMac, a 27” Apple monitor, a pink, white and grey mechanical keyboard and an Apple mouse.

A wide dark grey concrete top desk, with a 49” super ultra wide monitor, my pink laptop on an upright stand, 2 mechanical keyboards with rainbow lights and colourful keycaps, one of them is a split ergonomic keyboard. There’s also an iPad, a trackpad, a vertical mouse and a pink swivel chair.
